availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William K. Gray (Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, resident and recruiting officer (U.S.A.))

body.p: Frankfort, Franklin County, Kentucky, resident and soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of William H. Gray and Susan P. Gray. Served as Second Lieutenant Recruiting Officer in Frankfort, Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 62. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 241. Texas, Death Certificates, 1903-1982, Texas Department of State Health Services, No. 158. KYR-0002-222-0056.
